metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14291 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xpdf 4.01.01. There is an out of bounds read in the function GfxPatchMeshShading::parse at GfxState.cc for typeA==6 case 3.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 ebarretto> since 0.5.12-1 libextractor does not use xpdf anymore.

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.76.1-0ubuntu4').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
